DOC.criteria: Hypertension patient take antihypertensive agent , include Fimasartan least 12 week . Dyslipidemia patient take dyslipidemia drug , include Rosuvastatin least 12 week Patients blood pressure lipid level ( Total cholesterol , LDLC , HDLC , nonHDLC , * TG ) check 2 week registration Patients hospitalize Patients stop take Fimasartan Rosuvastatin within 12 week 14 consecutive day Patients 400mg/dl triglyceride ( TG ) registration time
